mapper.select: select sgg_cd, sgg_nm from (select ST_XMax(geom) as xmax, ST_XMin(geom) as xmin, ST_YMax(geom) as ymax, ST_YMin(geom) as ymin, sgg_cd, sgg_nm from tl_sgg group by sgg_cd, sgg_nm, tl_sgg.geom) point where (point.xmax > #{xvalue} and point.xmin < #{xvalue}) and (point.ymax > #{yvalue} and point.ymin < #{yvalue})
